Defined in src/scripts/app.js:427

Creates markers and infoWindows for each of the locations, sets map's center and bounds and animates the marker when clicked

Parameters:

  • placeData Object

    The filtered place recommended by Foursquare that matches markers and infoWindows which is going to be rendered on Google Maps
